Posts.Content: i had mets to lungs and just cleared it all in 4 months. this is so long ago you posted i would love to hear how it worked out with your friend. (and any others in this board). i did a combination of natural remedies and chemo - i read the book Radical Remission and followed each of their 9 principles. that's it. four months.  not too much pain barely any complications lot of hard work but it's very do-able once you've found the solid will to live. bless, cw

Posts.Title: Stage 4 Metastasis to the Lung

Posts.Content: aloha barb i just got the all clear from my scans as well. congratulations to you!!  i had exact same as you IDC hormone +/her2- huge mass in breast with mets to lymph and lungs diagnosed this year May 2015 and all clear by this month September 2015. i have yet to do any hormone or surgery but i am going to ask the surgeon if i should take out ovaries.  i am still in shock, btw =)
Posts.Title: Anyone else at Stage 4 in remission?

Posts.Content: I am reaching out in hopes that my story will inspire you. My stage iv diagnosis came in May of this year with no family history which came as a huge shock. It was even more shocking when my scans four months later revealed that I resolved it all! As an avid user of Snapchat I changed many women's opinions that the app is just for teens to sext each other and shared my entire story which you can now see as a quick video on YouTube. This is meant to inspire women I hope you can take a look and share. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VBYpjVcj0aw&feature=yout Bless, cw
Posts.Title: my stage iv fight in a snapchat story
